headline.main: NAZIS' TOLL IN EAST IS LISTED AS 337,342; High Command Figure on Dead and Missing in Russia Up 141,704 Since December RUSSIANS PUT IT HIGHER 'Annihilation' at Sevastopol Is Said to Go On -- Forces Massed on Front for Offensive

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, July 2 (From German broadcasts recorded by The Associated Press) -- Germany's dead and missing in the first full year of the war on the Russian front were placed by the High Command today at 337,342, an increase of 141,704 over Adolf Hitler's figures of last Dec. 11.
abstract: figures compared with Hitler Dec 11 estimate
